effects.effect: The wallmaster starts combat affixed to a wall. At the start of each round of combat while affixed to a wall, the wallmaster creates a 20 wall of stone within a distance of 10 squares. Any walls created by the wallmaster in the previous round are destroyed or replaced by the new walls.
The wallmaster chooses two wall segments within 10 squares. Each segment falls on a single target within distance, and is then destroyed.
The wallmaster chooses an additional wall segment and target for every 3 malice spent.
The wallmaster chooses one wall segment within 10 squares. The segment pushes a target within distance, and shifts into each square they leave behind.
The wallmaster teleports to a wall within distance and affixes itself to it.

abilities.name: Wall Redirect
abilities.trigger: A creature damages the wall with a strike.

effects.effect: The wall redirects the strike to the target creature and isn’t targeted by the strike.
